static int cvmx_higig_init ( int  interface,
int  port,
int  enable_higig2 
) [inline, static]

Initialize the HiGig aspects of a XAUI interface.

This function should be called before the cvmx-helper generic init.

Parameters:
interface Interface that this operation applies to
port is the interface port the operation applies to
enable_higig2 Non zero to enable HiGig2 support. Zero to support HiGig and HiGig+.
Returns:
Zero on success, negative on failure

NOTE: This function name and signature has changed from previous releases to support Octeon-3, where each interface may have up to 4 ports, and each may be individually enabled to accept the HiGig/HiGig2 custom frame format.
